title: Bestiale
overview: Yrehn, an Osamodas who loathes Men because of their cruelty towards animals and other living beings, is none other than the guardian of Elante: a legendary creature coveted by many opportunists because of its powerful magical virtues. One day, Elante is captured by the meat gang, a group of mafiosi determined to take advantage of her unique abilities! Yrehn immediately rushes to his aid, and begins a great adventure alongside her new friend Tim, during which she prepares to discover that all men are not necessarily evil, and that the world is in reality composed multiple shades of gray...
